_A.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

ProofOfReexportationReminder.description: A reminder that a requested Proof of Reexportation is pending.

ProofOfReexportationReminder.title: Proof Of Reexportation Reminder. Details
ProofOfReexportationReminder.description: A reminder that a requested Proof of Reexportation is pending.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Proof Of Reexportation Reminder. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Proof Of Reexportation Reminder. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Proof Of Reexportation Reminder. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Proof Of Reexportation Reminder. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Proof Of Reexportation Reminder. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

CopyIndicator.title: Proof Of Reexportation Reminder. Copy_ Indicator. Indicator
CopyIndicator.description: Indicates whether this document is a copy (true) or not (false).

UUID.title: Proof Of Reexportation Reminder. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

IssueDate.title: Proof Of Reexportation Reminder. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Proof Of Reexportation Reminder. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

ProcedureCode.title: Proof Of Reexportation Reminder. Procedure. Code
ProcedureCode.description: The procedure under which this reminder was sent, expressed as a code

Note.title: Proof Of Reexportation Reminder. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

VersionID.title: Proof Of Reexportation Reminder. Version. Identifier
VersionID.description: Identifies a version of a Proof of Reexportation Reminder in order to distinguish updates.

GoodsItemPassportID.title: Proof Of Reexportation Reminder. Goods Item Passport Identifier. Identifier
GoodsItemPassportID.description: An identifier for the associated Goods Item Passport, used when all counterfoils refer to the same.

ProofOfReexportationRequestDocumentRefer.title: Proof Of Reexportation Reminder. Proof Of Reexportation Request_ Document Reference. Document Reference
ProofOfReexportationRequestDocumentRefer.description: The Document Reference related to this Proof of Reexportation Request

ImportingGuarantorParty.title: Proof Of Reexportation Reminder. Importing Guarantor_ Party. Party
ImportingGuarantorParty.description: The party (often a chamber of commerce) that on behalf of their customs authority issues this document

ExportingGuarantorParty.title: Proof Of Reexportation Reminder. Exporting Guarantor_ Party. Party
ExportingGuarantorParty.description: The party (often a chamber of commerce) that are fiscally responsible for the Goods Item Passort counterfoils that the Customs Party are requesting

ImportingCustomsParty.title: Proof Of Reexportation Reminder. Importing Customs_ Party. Party
ImportingCustomsParty.description: An original requester of the Proof of Reexportation.

IssuerEndorsement.title: Proof Of Reexportation Reminder. Issuer_ Endorsement. Endorsement
IssuerEndorsement.description: An Issuers endorsment of this Request for Proof of Reexportation.

PaymentTerms.title: Proof Of Reexportation Reminder. Payment Terms
PaymentTerms.description: A set of payment terms associated with this Request for Proof of Reexportation, used for generating a subsequent invoice in case no proof of re-exportation can be provided.

GoodsItemPassportCounterfoil.title: Proof Of Reexportation Reminder. Goods Item Passport Counterfoil
GoodsItemPassportCounterfoil.description: The related Goods Item Passport Counterfoils of an associated Goods Item Passport.

AdditionalDocumentReference.title: Proof Of Reexportation Reminder. Additional_ Document Reference. Document Reference
AdditionalDocumentReference.description: One or more references to additional documents related to this Request for Proof of Reexportation

Signature.title: Proof Of Reexportation Reminder. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.
